variant.description: Sets the color scheme of the toaster.
variant.description_zh: 设置烤面包机的配色方案.

onOpenChange.description: Callback function that is called when the toaster is opened or closed.
onOpenChange.description_zh: 当烤面包机打开或关闭时调用的回调函数.

events.name: update:open
events.description: Emitted when the toaster is opened or closed.
events.description_zh: 当烤面包机打开或关闭时发出.

events.name: close
events.description: Emitted when the toaster is closed.
events.description_zh: 当烤面包机关闭时发出.
